title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Deep Connected Learning: Transferable Knowledge in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of language structures and fundamental competencies for teaching roles
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create concept maps explaining the interconnections among core language learning concepts (grammar, vocabulary, pragmatics)
Learners design three or more teaching strategies for applying language rules contextually in real classroom scenarios
Learners complete activity sheets analyzing differences in language use across diverse cultural contexts (formal/informal, regional dialects)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
